title: First Look: The Nordest 3003 Ti Flat Bar Gravel Bike for Watching the World, Not Watts
content:
The Nordest 3003 Ti takes a laid-back approach to gravel, with a 69Â° head tube angle and flat-bar geometry, with high-rise bars encouraged.
